rules_text:
[i]Origin[/i] – As Kris, First Choice enters, choose a creature type and up to two different colors. Kris is that creature type and those colors in addition to her other types and colors.
[i]Growths Exceeding[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that shares a color with Kris, put a +1/+1 counter on her. Whenever a creature with the chosen type enters, forge.
[i]Lieutenant[/i] – As long as you control your commander, whenever you modify a creature, draw a card. This ability triggers only twice each turn.
